com.esri.mo2.data.odb
Class DiskCacheImpl

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.esri.mo2.data.odb.DiskCacheImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
DiskCache
public class DiskCacheImpl
extends Object
implements DiskCache

This class implements DiskCache and supports the caching of objects to disk.

See Also:

public DiskCacheImpl(File file,
                     int cacheSize,
                     int fileSize)
              throws IOException
Constructs a disk cache and opens it.

Parameters:
file - the path of the actual file being used as a cache
cacheSize - the maximum size of the memory cache.
fileSize - the maximum size of the disk cache.
Throws:
IOException - if a file error occurs
Method Detail

getHitRatio

public double getHitRatio()
Description copied from interface: DiskCache
Retrieves the hit ratio for the disk cache. The returned value will be between 0 and 1 (inclusive). A value of 0.0 indicates the physical disk was hit on every access, while a value of 1.0 indicates that every object requested was in the LRU memory based object cache.

Specified by:
getHitRatio in interface DiskCache
Returns:
the ratio of memory cache hits to total accesses.

resetStatistics

public void resetStatistics()
Description copied from interface: DiskCache
Resets the hit ratio statistics for the disk cache.

Specified by:
resetStatistics in interface DiskCache
